Question.Subject: How do I switch back to a normal view on the internet? View/text size or zoom does not fix it.?
Question.Content: I don't remember hitting any buttons that changed it all of a sudden. Zoom only cuts part of the webpage out and view/text size changes don't really affect it.
Question.ChosenAnswer: Well you can either reinstall Internet Explorer, that would be the best choose or have to make a restore point to your computer it will fix anything on your computer either laptop or desktop

Answer.Content: Well you can either reinstall Internet Explorer, that would be the best choose or have to make a restore point to your computer it will fix anything on your computer either laptop or desktop
No need to reinstall, try pressing F11 once.
